Comment: Sanders is a backup QB talent wise with a massive ego and attitude. He was passed over until so late because no team wants to spend a quality draft pick on a backup QB and definitely not one that brings a media circus with them. This is the Tebow effect: when the outside circus is greater than the value you bring to the team, no team wants you. Tebow did not bring it on himself but the result is the same.
